page.title: 02AMENITIES OF WOOKEY HOLE
page.content: MANY VISITORS ARE UNAWARE OF THE PUBLIC SWIMMING POOL IN WOOKEY HOLE WHICH IS PART OF THE CAVES COMPLEX. THERE IS A MAIN POOL, WITH DIVNG BOARDS AND SLIDE, TOGETHER WITH A PADDLING POOL AND SUNBATHING TERRACES. NEARBY IS A RESTURAUNT AND A GIFT SHOP WHICH SELLS CONFECTIONERY AND SOUVENIRS. THE VILLAGE SHOP AND POST OFFICE IS AN INTERESTING BUILDING AS IT IS AT LEAST 200 YEARS OLD. CLOSE TO THE OLD PAPER MILL IS THE WOOKEY HOLE BOWLING GREEN WHOSE CLUB MEMBERS ARE OFTEN TO BE SEEN DRESSED IN WHITE. THE WOOKEY HOLE SOCIAL CLUB, BUILT IN 1884,HAS SEEN LITTLE CHANGE SINCE, EXCEPT THE ADDITION OF A SKITTLE ALLEY BUILT IN THE ASSEMBLY ROOM FORMERLY USED BY THE VILLAGERS.
